Description:
Position Title:             Housekeeping AttendantEmployment Type:     Full TimeSalary:                        up to 1.8K QAR plus accommodation, transportation, tips, and mealsJob Location:            Doha, Qatar About the Client:A 5-star hotel with outstanding resort facilities and high-end dining options overlooking the Persian Gulf in the West Bay area of Doha, Qatar Job Description:Interact courteously and professionally with guests when providing turndown service, responding to requests, or addressing any concerns.
Maintain adequate stock of cleaning supplies, toiletries, and linens to ensure efficient room turnovers.
Check for any maintenance issues, such as broken fixtures or malfunctioning equipment, and report them for repair.
Maintain a high level of cleanliness and organization in all housekeeping areas, including storage rooms and linen closets.Skills
Skills:
At least 2 years of experience as a Housekeeping Attendant
Female, 35 years old and below
Open to Filipino candidates in Qatar and overseas
